title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategies Based on Hypermedia for Continuing Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and comprehension of statistics
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based mobile learning environment with case-based practical education

learning_goals: Learners can apply self-regulated learning strategies—such as goal setting, time management, and resource utilization—with 80% or higher accuracy in hypermedia environments.
Learners can analyze medical statistical data and solve three or more practical cases using mathematical modeling techniques.
Learners can perform self-assessments using a monitoring checklist during the learning process and reflect on feedback with 90% or higher participation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
